## HandlingTarget type

Display target type that allows both predefined enum values and custom strings. This enables flexibility for custom UI components while providing standard options.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type HandlingTarget = HandlingTargets | string;
```
**References:** [HandlingTargets](./error-x.handlingtargets.md)

## Example


```typescript
// Using predefined enum values
targets: [HandlingTargets.MODAL, HandlingTargets.TOAST]

// Using custom strings
targets: ['custom-sidebar', 'my-notification-center']

// Mixing both
targets: [HandlingTargets.MODAL, 'custom-popup', HandlingTargets.CONSOLE]
```
